resources.string: Digital Jacquard Loom: In the 2000s, digital Jacquard looms became more prevalent, allowing for complex designs and patterns to be woven directly from digital files.
Smart Textiles: By the 2010s, advancements in smart textiles and wearable technology began to influence the weaving industry, integrating electronic components into fabrics.
Sustainable Weaving: In the 2020s, the focus shifted towards sustainable weaving practices, using eco-friendly materials and processes to reduce the environmental impact of textile production.
